title: Kentucky Downtown Lexington Art Hotel with Onsite Museum & Trendy Restaurant
description:
21c Museum Hotel Lexington is where contemporary art and refined hospitality meet in the heart of downtown Lexington. This unique retreat is home to a curated art museum, with rotating exhibitions and interactive installations woven throughout its public spaces. Just steps away, discover the historic Kentucky Theatre, the Mary Todd Lincoln House and the vibrant Distillery District, where bourbon tastings and local bites await.

Savour inventive Southern cuisine at the acclaimed onsite Lockbox restaurant, helmed by celebrated chefs and featuring locally sourced ingredients.
